text: geulihayeo hananim-eun geulo ha yeo uliga boneun ap-eseo uliui gyesie ttala bangjuleul mandeulla hayeoss-eu myeo uliui myeonglyeong-eulo gyegog-i mullo neomchini gag jonglyuui han ssang-gwa neoui gajog-eul taeulaneun malsseum-i iss-eossnolageuleona geojeolhan jadeul-eun je-oela joe jieun jadeul-eul wihae naege guwonhaji malla geudeul-eun igsahal geos-ila
